document_data.name: Tsanbrin Aulmeroevler
document_data.deathnotes: Slain by [[Brymmyn Thorl]] during a Magisterial duel.
document_data.mainbody: '''Tsanbrin Aulmeroevler''' held the title of [[Magister]] of [[Faer√ªn]] from [[242 DR]] until [[244 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Tsanbrin was a cheerful trickster. He was driven by a need to perform acrobatics and pranks, freely giving away magical secrets in the process.
document_data.History:
Tsanbrin challenged [[Weldrarn Orblin]] after that Magister destroyed the school of wizardry where Tsanbrin was studying in [[Sultim]]. Tsanbrin was only able to defeat Weldrarn in the duel because of his impressive acrobatic skills and chaotic behavior. Weldrarn unknowingly blasted a tower during the duel which crashed on top of him resulting in his death.

Tsanbrin lost his second duel as Magister, perishing at the hands of [[Brymmyn Thorl]]. After his death Tsanbrin served [[Mystra]] as one of the goddesses strongest [[shadowstaff|shadowstaves]].
